definition: variant of 蒙在鼓裡|蒙在鼓里[meng2 zai4 gu3 li3]
lit. kept inside a drum (idiom)/fig. completely in the dark
to deceive/to cheat/to hoodwink/to make a wild guess
blind/dim-sighted
Mongol ethnic group/abbr. for Mongolia 蒙古國|蒙古国[Meng3 gu3 guo2]/Taiwan pr. [Meng2]
(knocked) unconscious/dazed/stunned
to cover/ignorant/to suffer (misfortune)/to receive (a favor)/to cheat
surname Meng
drizzle/mist
(located) at/(to be) in/to exist/in the middle of doing sth/(indicating an action in progress)
drum/CL:通[tong4],面[mian4]/to drum/to strike/to rouse/to bulge/to swell
old variant of 鼓[gu3]

li, ancient measure of length, approx. 500 m/neighborhood/ancient administrative unit of 25 families/(Tw) borough, administrative unit between the township 鎮|镇[zhen4] and neighborhood 鄰|邻[lin2] levels
Li (surname)
lining/interior/inside/internal/also written 裏|里[li3]
variant of 裡|里[li3]

sentences.english: Lawyers often keep their clients in the dark.
sentences.chinese: 律师经常会让他们的客户蒙在鼓里。

sentences.english: I think believing full scale only on the versions of one party is being unmindful of what the truth is.
sentences.chinese: 我认为全盘相信一方的观点只会把自己蒙在鼓里。

sentences.english: The USA has sold us to the Russians and stabbed us in the back, " screamed one Polish tabloid, Fakt."
sentences.chinese: 美国将我们卖给了我俄罗斯人，还将我们蒙在鼓里。

definition: to play tricks on/to make a fool of
inside story/inside information
to reckon/to calculate/to plan/to expect/to scheme
to use (sb) as a tool
to expose/to uncover
to bear grudges
to harbor evil intentions (idiom)
to entrap/to set up/to frame (up)/to make false charges against
to know the facts/to understand/to be familiar with the situation
to kill/to cause death/to do sb to death
to penetrate/to see through
to kill secretly/to stab in the back
to act in collusion (idiom)
to cause or lead to sth bad
lit. to strike with a muckrake (idiom), cf Pigsy 豬八戒|猪八戒 in Journey to the West 西遊記|西游记; fig. to counterattack/to make bogus accusations (against one's victim)
variant of 矇騙|蒙骗[meng1 pian4]
to hoodwink/to deceive/to dupe sb
